name: InternBit
shortDesp: InternBit is a web application that seeks to make internship searching easier.

name: Ono On The Way
shortDesp: Ono On-The-Way is a web application that UH Manoa students can use when they do not want interrupt their work to go out for on-campus food.

name: Discord To-Do Bot
shortDesp: A Discord "Todo" bot I developed used by Moderators of a Discord server with 700+ members.

name: Surf's Up - Dog Edition
shortDesp: Developed a game where the objective was to survive as long as possible.
